# Setup

## Libraries

Which libraries will we use and why?

```{r libraries}
library(tidyverse)
library(skimr)
library(naniar)
```

## Import Data

```{r import-data}
duodata <- read_csv("data_flatformat.csv")
```

# Examine Data

```{r}
glimpse(duodata)
duoskim <- skim(duodata)
duoskim
```

## Sample Data

```{r sample}
duosample <- sample_n(duodata, 2622956/54)
```

```{r}
duosample |>
  pivot_longer(cols = where(is.numeric),
               names_to = "variable",
               values_to = "value") |>
  ggplot() +
  geom_bar(aes(value)) +
  facet_wrap(. ~ variable, 
             scales = "free") + 
  coord_flip()

vis_miss(sample_n(duodata, 2622956/54)) 
```
